<PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>Good afternoon.<NL>Did you come by to see Dr. Aki again?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Yup!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>Well, then you should go check his<NL>office all the way in the back.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Okay, thanks a lot!<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>Pleased to meet you.<NB>My name is Nae,<NL>what's your name?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Nice to meet you.<NL>My name is <MEM:0>.<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>Nae is Dr. Aki's granddaughter.<NL>She's well known throughout the Medabot<NL>world as the authority on all things that<NL>are related to Medabots.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Wow, that's amazing!<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>Let us drop the formalities, shall we?<NL>So, do you like Medabots?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Yup!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>Well then, do you want to come see<NL>my research lab?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Wha!?<NL>Are you sure it's okay?<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>Miss Nae!<NB>Surely you can't be serious about showing<NL>such important research to a kid!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>I really don't mind. <NB>So, shall we go <MEM:0>?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Okay!<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>It looks like a fight is about <NL>to begin!<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Good afternoon, Dr. Aki.<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 19, 0>Hmm? Oh, it's you.<NL>You come here quite a lot.<NB>Don't you know I'm always busy?<NL>um···uh···<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Dr. Akiii! <NL>You always forget my name!<NB>I'm···<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:0, 19, 0>Oh, of course!<NL>You're <MEM:0>.<NB>But I'm busy so I can't<NL>spend too much time with you.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>But I wanna learn more about<NL>Medabots!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 19, 2>Okay, okay.<NL>If you really mean that, <NL>then it'd be best to go visit my <NL>granddaughter Nae's research room.<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>Your granddaughter?<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 19, 1>My granddaughter Nae has been helping<NL>me ever since she was little.<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 19, 2>She knows almost as much as <NL>I do about Medabots.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Really? Yay!<NL>Okay, well, I guess I'll be going!<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:0, 19, 2>Nae really loves Medabots, so you two<NL>will probably get along very well.<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>I'm not always here,<NL>but I'll leave the room open,<NB>so you can come in whenever you want.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Okay!<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Good afternoon, Miss Nae!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>Good afternoon, <MEM:0>.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Check out my cool new Medawatch!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 20, 1>Well then, I'll just have to give you <NL>a present to congratulate you on<NB>your new Medabot!<NB>Please go into the room next door<NL>and select one Medal of your choice.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Are you sure it's okay?<NL>Yay!  Thank you very much!<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:0, 20, 0>The 4 Medabots over there are the<NL>new "Elemental Series" that we are<NL>developing now.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>Elemental Series?<NB>I've never heard of that before<NL>on "Medabots Weekly".<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 20, 1>Actually, it's still a secret♥<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 7>Holy Medaroli! <NL>I get to see them before everyone!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 20, 2>We're not finished with them yet,<NL>so they aren't fully functional.<NB>But you can go see them for yourself.<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:0, 2, 1>Wasn't that amazing! <NL>What WAS that just now?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>Umm···I don't really know.<NB>Anyway Erika, what's the headline of<NL>the school's paper's gonna be?<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 2, 4>Hmm··· How about<NL>"Awesome Medabot Appears!"<NB>What do you think?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 5>I like "Awesome Medafighter Appears."<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 2, 0>No no, your Medabot was awesome,<NL>not you, <MEM:0>.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 5>Aw man···<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 2, 4>Okay, well I'm gonna go<NL>start writing the article, so why<NB>don't you go and look for Robattle<NL>opponents around school?<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>Well, guess I'll go look around<NL>school for some Robattles.<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:1, 0, 0>Let's go inside the school.<END:0>

<PORTRAIT:0, 2, 6>Those guys fight so dirty!<NB>They always say "The 3 of us count as 1!<NB>So if you can't beat all 3 of us,<NL>then you can't win."<NB>They also say incredibly lame excuses that<NL>not even grade-schoolers use anymore.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 5>Erika···<NB>Don't forget that we are all<NL>still grade schoolers, you know···<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:0, 22, 0>My Medabot may have lost the Robattle,<NL>but he'll take anybody on in a relay race!<NB>Maybe···<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:0, 34, 0>Waaaah.<NB>They took my Medaparts!<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:0, 22, 0>Geez, they might be the champions<NL>again this year···<END:0>
<PORTRAIT:0, 22, 0>That Robattle rocked!<END:0>
